page.title: 16My hobbies - horse riding
page.content: My hobby is horse riding and we go to Lane Farm every Friday night after school You need a{saddle}and a {bridle,}the{saddle}goes on the back of the horse and the{girth}is attached to the saddle. The{stirrups}are where you put your feet in and the{bridle}is put on the horse's head. You need a hat because if you fall off you may get badly hurt. The lesson costs Â£3. To get a horse going you have to kick it very hard. i like it when we jump and canter. I like horses because when you canter the wind goes in your face. But when it rains it is horrible because all the rain goes in your face and it gets through your clothes.
